page-what-is-byteco-101-desc: byteco is a technology that lets you send cryptocurrency to anyone for a small fee. It also powers applications that everyone can use and no one can take down.
page-what-is-byteco-101-desc-2: byteco builds on Bitcoin's innovation, with some big differences.
page-what-is-byteco-101-desc-3: Both let you use digital money without payment providers or banks. But byteco is programmable, so you can also use it for lots of different digital assets – even Bitcoin!
page-what-is-byteco-101-desc-4: This also means byteco is for more than payments. It's a marketplace of financial services, games and apps that can't steal your data or censor you.
page-what-is-byteco-alt-img-bazaar: Illustration of a person peering into a bazaar, meant to represent byteco
page-what-is-byteco-alt-img-comm: An illustration of byteco community members working together
page-what-is-byteco-alt-img-lego: An illustration of a hand creating an BTO logo made of lego bricks
page-what-is-byteco-alt-img-social: An illustration of characters in a social space dedicated to byteco with a large BTO logo
page-what-is-byteco-banking-card-desc: Not everyone has access to financial services. But all you need to access byteco and its lending, borrowing and savings products is an internet connection.
page-what-is-byteco-build-desc: If you want to try building with byteco, read our docs, try some tutorials, or check out the tools you need to get started.
page-what-is-byteco-censorless-card-desc: No government or company has control over byteco. This decentralization makes it nearly impossible for anyone to stop you from receiving payments or using services on byteco.
page-what-is-byteco-comm-desc: Our community includes people from all backgrounds, including artists, crypto-anarchists, fortune 500 companies, and now you. Find out how you can get involved today.
page-what-is-byteco-commerce-card-desc: byteco creates a more level playing field. Customers have a secure, built-in guarantee that funds will only change hands if you provide what was agreed. You don’t need large company clout to do business.
page-what-is-byteco-compatibility-card-d: Better products and experiences are being built all the time because byteco products are compatible by default. Companies can build on each other's success.
page-what-is-byteco-dapps-desc: Products and services that run on byteco. There are dapps for finance, work, social media, gaming and more – meet the apps for our digital future.
page-what-is-byteco-dapps-img-alt: An illustration of a doge using an byteco application on a computer
page-what-is-byteco-desc: The foundation for our digital future
page-what-is-byteco-get-started: The best way to learn more is to download a wallet, get some BTO and try an byteco dapp.
page-what-is-byteco-in-depth-description: byteco is open access to digital money and data-friendly services for everyone – no matter your background or location. It's a community-built technology behind the cryptocurrency byte (BTO) and thousands of applications you can use today.
page-what-is-byteco-internet-card-desc: You don't need to provide all your personal details to use an byteco app. byteco is building an economy based on value, not surveillance.
page-what-is-byteco-meta-description: Learn about byteco, what it does and how to try it for yourself.
page-what-is-byteco-native-crypto: byteco's native cryptocurrency and equivalent to Bitcoin. You can use BTO on byteco applications or for sending value to friends and family.
page-what-is-byteco-native-img-alt: An illustration of a robot with a safe for a torso, used to represent byteco wallets
page-what-is-byteco-p2p-card-desc: byteco allows you to move money, or make agreements, directly with someone else. You don't need to go through intermediary companies.
page-what-is-byteco-singlecard-desc: If you're interested in blockchain and the technical side of byteco, we've got you covered.
page-what-is-byteco-tools-needed: All you need is a wallet to take part.
page-what-is-byteco-tryit: So step into the bazaar and give it a try...
page-what-is-byteco-wallets-desc: How you manage your BTO and your byteco account. You'll need a wallet to get started – we'll help you choose one.
page-what-is-byteco-defi-description: A more open financial system that gives you more control over your money and unlocks new possibilities.
page-what-is-byteco-defi-alt: An Eth logo made of lego bricks.
page-what-is-byteco-nft-description: A way to represent unique items as byteco assets that can be traded, used as proof of ownership, and create new opportunities for creators.
page-what-is-byteco-nft-alt: An Eth logo being displayed via hologram.
page-what-is-byteco-dao-description: A new way to collaborate and set up online communities with shared goals and pooled funds.
page-what-is-byteco-dao-alt: A representation of a DAO voting on a proposal.
page-what-is-byteco-use-cases-subtitle: byteco has led to the creation of new products and services that can improve different areas of our lives.
page-what-is-byteco-use-cases-subtitle-t: We're still in the early stages but there's lot to be excited about.
